Key:
Maybe I'll check out the rooftop. I hope Kurumi's
there.

I'll try going to the rooftop. Kurumi's like a
phantom, so she might be there. At least,
I hope.
What am I talking about...?

(I sound like a girl with a crush... Kind of
embarrassing.)
Itsuka-kun!
...Huh?
I finally got you...

H-Huh? What are you doing here Tama-cha—
I mean, Okamine-sensei?

I know you've been on leave so it can't be
helped, but your social studies paper is due
today.
Oh...
You're the only one who hasn't turned it in yet.

Um, could you give me an extension? I'll get
right to it.
Nope. You can't slide out of this one!

You'd better turn it in today. I'll wait for you
in the teacher's lounge... Promise me!
*sigh*...
(I can't help it, I guess... I'll do my report.)

...Good job. Next time, be sure to not forget,
okay?
Okay. Sorry about that. I'll be on my way then!
Okay!
*sigh*... Look at the time.

The sun's set. I don't think I can go on a date
today... *sigh*.

If I will suffice, then I can go with you now if
you'd like?
Kurumi?! So you WERE at school today!

Good day, Shido-san. Last night was certainly
stimulating.

Yeah. Thanks to you, I got a scolding from my
little sister. But you saved me. Thanks.
You're welcome.

Anyways, I've told you before, but you shouldn't
be walking around school like this. It'd only
cause more problems.
Oh, but I'm careful not let anyone detect me.

I wanted to see you earlier, but... I am
refraining as much as I can, you know?
O-Oh...
...So then, how about that date?
You won't blush again, will you?
Hehe, I don't know. That's up to you.

Okay, fine. It's kinda hard to find somewhere
to go right now, isn't it?
...I don't mind it being here.
Huh? Here... as in the classroom?
Yes, isn't it wonderful? To be your classmate.

You were my classmate until recently. Although
it was a little short for my liking.
Don't mind the details.

I'm regretting it a little. I wish I had done
much more when we were classmates.
Then, do you want to be my classmate?
...Excuse me?

It's only you and me here. It might just be
role-play, but if you don't mind, we can play
pretend.
Well... That sounds very fun. Hehe.

Then, allow me to introduce myself. My name
is Kurumi Tokisaki. Nice to meet you.

Isn't that different from how it happened?
Remember... you used to say, I am a Spirit"..."
But then I wouldn't be a normal classmate.
I-I see... you have a point.
Um, Shido-san?
What is it?
...What do classmates do?
Uh, I don't know.
My, you don't know either, Shido-san?
I never thought about it.
You wanna just do stuff that we'd do at school?
Sure. Then, how's this...?
...Shido-san?
Y-Yes, Tokisaki-sensei.
This area requires correction.
Oh! I-I'm sorry...
Hehe... Bad boy.
(S-So close! Her face is too close!)
...Oh, and I spotted one more error.
Huh...?
When we are alone... you must call me Kurumi.
K-Kurumi... sensei.
Hehe...
Y-You're a little... too close!
Silly boy, it's intentional.
We're not done yet. Enough calling me sensei".
K-Kurumi...
Well done. Would you like a reward?
H-Hey! Keep your clothes on!
Oh, but I'm just getting started.

Y-You know, Kurumi... Classmates wouldn't
do this!
Hehe. Come to think of it, you're right.

You know, Kurumi. Where'd you learn how to
act out these... scenarios?
Where? At the bookstore you visited, Shido-san.

Seriously?! And you should've called...
Wait, no, that's not even it! AAAAH!
Are you that shocked?
Please forget you saw that.
Hehe. Very well.
Haha...
What's the matter?
Well, I figured it'd be like this.
...Huh?

Being able to talk about whimsical stuff or
nothing at all... Even being able to have fun.
Is that so...?
Yeah, I think... That's how it is for us.
Oh, I gotta get going soon.
I see. I had hoped to be with you a bit longer.
Oh, sorry... If I had made the time...
I don't mind. Rather...

Thank you for today. I quite enjoyed myself.
Although our time was short, I was able to
be your classmate again.
Y-Yeah...
It's nice to have a friend.
Yup, the feeling is mutual.
Well, good night, Shido-san.
Okay... Later.

Kurumi seemed to be having a good time. It
was as if she was an ordinary girl.

(But Kurumi has a secret, and it might be
something we don't see eye to eye on.)

(I won't know unless I ask her the truth,
but... I wish Kurumi could tell me first.)

(I want to continue enjoying myself around
Kurumi. Thinking about it now, maybe this is what
Kotori meant when she said I have no urgency.)
